The CERES Archive contains a complete record of past and present issues of our Renaissance internet newsletter and review
column2: Harvest.  It comprises the current Harvest
column4: a digest of the first series (October 1996-June 1997)
column5: a digest of the second series (June-December 1997)
column6: a digest of the third series (January 1998-March 1999)
column7: and back issues of the second series

column1: <i>Please note that much of the information available in these documents has been digested from the sources described
column2: and may thus retain their wording. In many cases
column3: out of date material and links from older issues have not been updated.

column1: Our Renaissance internet newsletter and review
column3: is now issued (roughly) quarterly.  It details the latest and most interesting additions to online resources of relevance to scholars and students of early modern English studies
column4: providing content summaries and critical reviews. If you would like to join the growing list of subscribers
column5: please drop a note to one of the editors
